_sText:
Psalms 62:1-2

Map Name: gg_blackhawk_beta1
Version: Beta 1
Author: Dan Jack 
Alias: [KORT] Black Hawk
-----------------------------------------------------
Beta 1:
Time Taken : Approximately 35 hours

Features:

-  Re-created an old map I made called mp5knivez and completely transformed it to a dust theme.
-  Added rooms behind the map, boxes, and barrels, cars.
-  Added a hidden room with a bridge in the center of the map, with trigger_hurt at the bottom.
-  Added a seagull trigger 
-  Added 3 env_soundscapes in the map
-  Added dust particles and dust smoke
-  Added 3 point_viewcontrol
-  Added 20 spawn points for both T and CT
-  Added a rope line
-----------------------------------------------------
Plans for Beta 2:

-  Editing up sound triggers better
-  Support beams
-  Slightly better lighting
-  Editing env_cubemap
-  More info decals 
-  Custom created textures in photoshop
-  More prop_static and prop_physics
-  A hidden room
-----------------------------------------------------
Email me at Dan.Jack.Design@gmail.com if you have questions/comments.
Also if you see any errors on my map or any suggestions on making it
better, send me an E-mail... a picture of the error would be great too.

Special Thanks:	
- To all sites that host my map.
- The best clans in the world, [KORT] and <CC><
- God and my friends and family

INSTALLATION: 

You must extract both gg_blackhawk_beta1.bsp to:
C:\Program Files\Valve\Steam\SteamApps\<YOUR STEAM ACCOUNT>\counter-strike source\maps

Enjoy.
-----------------------------------------------------
